def maxNumGuests(N, arrival, departure):
	count = 0
	maxCount = 0
	arrival.sort()
	departure.sort()
	i, j = 0, 0
	while i<N and j<N:
		if arrival[i] < departure[j]:
			count += 1
			maxCount = max(maxCount, count)
			i += 1
		else:
			count -= 1
			j += 1
	return maxCount

T = int(stdin.readline())
for _ in range(T):
	N = int(stdin.readline())
	arrival = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
	departure = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
	print maxNumGuests(N, arrival, departure)
